comments:
I don't know if the DetailedProgressViewer is the cause of this error or not.  I have a very large workspace and several product level builders which take a very  long time to complete.  The problem is that with the progress view open, the builders don't complete due to the following exception.  The default resource perspective was open with nothing else execept for the progress view and Sleak open.  Sleak didn't turn up any useful information, which is why I'm opening this bug. I noticed the progress view seems to flicker a lot and if I scroll down to the bottom of the view (there are 40+ builders scheduled) the view often jumps back to the top.  Is it possible that this view is leaking handles?

I reran the exact same sceario only this time I closed all views except the Navigator and did not run out of handles, so I think it is probably related to either the DetailedProgressViewer or the Tasks view.
